sentences.sContent: Turner inherited the right to fish at this spot from his father.
sentences.sContent_eng: Turner inherited the right to fish at this spot from his father.
sentences.sCn: 特纳从父亲那里继承了在这个地点捕鱼的权利。

sentences.sContent: I, Jonathan Turner, give every cent I have to my three children.
sentences.sContent_eng: I, Jonathan Turner, give every cent I have to my three children.
sentences.sCn: 我——乔纳森·特纳，将我所有的财产留给我的孩子们。

words.tran: 车工工艺；车削产品；车床工厂
